samanya hayidrajan paramanuwa samanwitha wi aththe ilektronayak saha protonayak wethin wana athara, prathihayidrajan paramanuwa sadi aththe positronayak saha prathiprotonayak wethini. 1995 di thwaraka parikshana waladi, kruthrima lesin prathihayidrajan sadena bawa danagath namuth, ewani "wara" prawegayanhidi nipayena paramanu, sawisthara piriksumakata bhajanaya kirimata pera padarthaya samaga gatemin winasha wi yamata prawanathawayak pawathini. 2010 nowambar hidi, palamu warata, sasil prathihayidrajan nipayunu athara,
